problem_text_cn: 如图,菱形ABCD和菱形ECGF,且B、C、G共线,若菱形ABCD和菱形ECGF的边长分别为4和6,∠A=120°,则图中阴影部分的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the diamond ABCD and the diamond ECGF, and B, C, and G are collinear, if the edge lengths of the diamond ABCD and the diamond ECGF are N_0 and N_1, ∠A = N_2, then the area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is ()
